# Trafft Integration Configuration
# Generated by trafft_setup_config.py

# Your Backend URLs
BACKEND_URL=https://sixfb-backend.onrender.com
WEBHOOK_URL=https://sixfb-backend.onrender.com/api/v1/webhooks/trafft
API_DOCS_URL=https://sixfb-backend.onrender.com/docs

# Environment Variables for Render
# IMPORTANT: Replace <YOUR_TRAFFT_API_KEY> with your actual API key!
TRAFFT_API_URL=https://api.trafft.com
TRAFFT_API_KEY=<YOUR_TRAFFT_API_KEY>
TRAFFT_WEBHOOK_SECRET=fNul8emtRcb6n6uHxtMGErbLNBrhyE3EGLST2tnr4ws

# API Endpoints for Integration
CONNECT_ENDPOINT=POST https://sixfb-backend.onrender.com/api/v1/api/trafft/connect
REGISTER_WEBHOOKS_ENDPOINT=POST https://sixfb-backend.onrender.com/api/v1/api/trafft/webhooks/register
INITIAL_SYNC_ENDPOINT=POST https://sixfb-backend.onrender.com/api/v1/api/trafft/sync/initial
STATUS_ENDPOINT=GET https://sixfb-backend.onrender.com/api/v1/api/trafft/status
WEBHOOK_STATUS_ENDPOINT=GET https://sixfb-backend.onrender.com/api/v1/api/trafft/webhooks/status

# cURL Examples (replace YOUR_6FB_TOKEN with your actual auth token)
# Connect:
curl -X POST https://sixfb-backend.onrender.com/api/v1/api/trafft/connect \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_6FB_TOKEN" \
  -d '{"api_key": "YOUR_TRAFFT_API_KEY"}'

# Register Webhooks:
curl -X POST https://sixfb-backend.onrender.com/api/v1/api/trafft/webhooks/register \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_6FB_TOKEN"

# Initial Sync:
curl -X POST https://sixfb-backend.onrender.com/api/v1/api/trafft/sync/initial \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_6FB_TOKEN"
